transArray.content:
Jun Jun at the front desk is very friendly, the hotel is cost-effective, and the location is good. The room is exquisite, very clean, well ventilated, well lit, good hardware, comfortable to use, good bath water temperature, and smooth water flow! The aunt in the room is very kind and considerate.
Parent-child highlights: The bed is against the wall, so there is no need to worry about children falling off the bed.
Will recommend friends to live here~~~~~
